text: Xallxhˌ midi thrng ham phwk cea keiyw kab brrda phu thi midi txtan phwk cea nı reuxng sasna læa phwk khea midi khab li phwk cea xxk cak banreuxn khxng phwk cea nı kar thi phwk cea ca thakhwam di kæ phwk khea læa hı khwam yutithrrm kæ phwk khea thæ cring xallxhˌ thrng rak phu mi khwam yutithrrm
